description.value:
This crooked staff is made from twisting acacia wood and has a sphere of rough sandstone embedded in the top, to channel the magic of the desert. When wielding this staff in deserts, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to Subsist, Track, and Cover Tracks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from the staff's list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tXa5vOu5giBNCjdR]{Know the Way}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{Create Water}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{Pass Without Trace}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{Environmental Endurance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rdTEF1hfAWbN58NE]{Enhance Victuals}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pr1ruNTbzGn3H9w5]{Stone to Flesh}
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}
  • 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.M0jQlpQYUr0pp2Sv]{Horrid Wilting}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.U0hL0LLaprcnAyzC]{Wind Walk}
  • 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r4HLQcYwB62bTayl]{Storm of Vengeance}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells
